description:
I can't say how I met Rand in order to protect his privacy, but I can tell you that he's a college student at a very conservative religious university. The idea of doing nude modeling was intriguing to him, as most religious schools have strict conduct codes that stifle anything the least bit fun!
While he was doing the video, he seemed to enjoy showing off his smooth, toned body. He's straight and said he'd be interested in fucking a girl on film, just so long as his family didn't find out. Maybe he'll be back... who knows if we reached the limits of his rebellion!
title: Rand
